net.adamcin.recap.api

Interface RecapAddress

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRecapAddress, RecapAddressImpl

    public interface RecapAddress
    Object representing connection details for a remote JCR repository DavEx endpoint. A URL constructed from this address would follow the pattern: http(s)://[username]:[password]@[hostname]:[port][contextPath][prefix]
    Version:
    $Id: RecapAddress.java$
    Author:
    madamcin
